en.question: During the End Phase, I have 9 "Noble Knight" monsters in my Graveyard. I activate the "● 9:" effect of Noble Knights of the Round Table, adding 1 "Noble Knight" monster in my Graveyard to my hand, so that the number of "Noble Knight" monsters in my Graveyard is now 8. During that same End Phase, my opponent uses Raigeki Break to destroy a "Noble Knight" monster I control, so that the number of "Noble Knight" monsters in my Graveyard is 9 again. Can I activate the "● 9:" effect of Noble Knights of the Round Table again during that same End Phase?
en.title: During the End Phase, I have 9 "Noble Knight" monsters in my Graveyard. I activate the "● 9:" effect of Noble Knights of the Round Table, adding 1 "Noble Knight" monster in my Graveyard to my hand, so that the number of "Noble Knight" monsters in my Graveyard is now 8. During that same End Phase, my opponent uses Raigeki Break to destroy a "Noble Knight" monster I control, so that the number of "Noble Knight" monsters in my Graveyard is 9 again. Can I activate the "● 9:" effect of Noble Knights of the Round Table again during that same End Phase?

ja.question:
「<<11202>>」の『●９種類以上：自分の墓地の「聖騎士」モンスター１体を対象として発動できる。そのモンスターを手札に加える』効果の処理を行い、自分の墓地の「聖騎士」と名のついたモンスターが８種類になりました。

その同一のエンドフェイズにて、「<<5544>>」を発動し、自分の墓地の「聖騎士」と名のついたモンスターが再び９種類になった場合、『●９種類以上：自分の墓地の「聖騎士」モンスター１体を対象として発動できる。そのモンスターを手札に加える』効果をもう一度発動できますか？
ja.title: 「<<11202>>」の『●』の効果を一度発動し、適用した後に墓地の「聖騎士｣と名のついたモンスターの数が変化した場合、再度発動できるようになりますか？
